Sharks have long been feared for their really sharp teeth. Although that is enough to keep most people away from those animals, one part of them that has been received with open arms is their fins. The Chinese eat it in the way of a soup, which they say has many things that are good for people’s health. The dish has even grown to become a sign of wealth and class for them.
For many others, shark fin soup is mean and not needed. The reason for that is how the shark fin is taken. It is called shark-finning, and it cuts the fins off living sharks before throwing them back into the ocean. There, they not only lose blood and die, but they also become food for other sea animals. Shark-finning is threatening the sharks and the oceans because the animals grow slowly and some types are already dying off. Millions of these sea animals die every year, which throws everything off balance.
Lucky for us, governments across the planet have taken action to try to fix this problem. In 2000, the USA made shark-finning illegal. Also, Palau, the Maldives, and the Bahamas have set up natural places that are safe for sharks. Thanks to those actions and others, people have become more aware. More people who are getting married don’t have shark fin soup at their weddings. Also, some restaurants have taken the dish off their menus.

Dear Mavis,
I’m sorry that I didn’t call you as soon as I arrived in New York City as you asked me to. The reason for that is I’ve been busy seeing the sights and having the time of my life. This is the first chance I’ve gotten to sit down and check my e-mails.
Anyway, it’s time that you catch up on what I’ve been up to since I checked in at my hotel on Monday. Yesterday, I got up early because I planned to walk across the Brooklyn Bridge, check out Wall Street, and then visit the 911 Memorial. When I got to the bridge, it was blocked off because a group of people were filming a movie. I moved closer to see if I knew anybody. You’re not going to believe this, but I saw my favorite actor, Tom Hanks, acting there. I tried to take a picture of him, but a guard stopped me before I could. He told me I could stay around and watch as long as I kept quiet and didn’t try that again. Though it was interesting, I decided to leave and finish what I set out to do. The day before that, I spent most of my time exploring Central Park and some of the museums around there. Also, on the first morning, I headed straight for the Empire State Building and then Times Square because I was dying to see them.
There’s too much to share in one e-mail, so I’ll tell you more next time. The city is calling my name, and I must not keep it waiting.
Your friend,
Stephanie

The History and Poses of Yoga
Yoga is an old practice that has been around for thousands of years. It is from India and has a rich history. The word "yoga" comes from the Sanskrit language and means to unite or join. Yoga is all about connecting your body and mind through different poses and breathing ways.
One of the most famous books about yoga is the Yoga Sutras of Patanjali, written around 200 BC. Patanjali is the father of yoga.
Yoga has many poses, and each pose has its own benefits. Tree Pose is all about balance, as you stand on one leg with the other foot pressed against your thigh. Is AI Friend or Foe?
Many teachers have been experimenting with AI technologies, like ChatGPT, in the classroom. ChatGPT is a chatbot developed by OpenAI. The company’s website became one of the 50 most‑visited in the world this year.
People can ask the chatbot a question, and it will reply with an answer in essay form. Students and teachers are considering the effects of this on schools.
Some school districts have banned ChatGPT. Some teachers see it as a tool that can be used to cheat. However, many educators say it’s too late to keep AI out of their classrooms. Some think ChatGPT is to English and writing what the calculator is to math. Some teachers said ChatGPT helped them come up with creative ideas for classes and to simplify texts for students not fluent in English.
ChatGPT’s answers are not always right. Text generated by ChatGPT often contains factual errors, can be in the wrong format, or the tone can be off. What’s more, it may contain biases from the data it uses. For example, the views, knowledge, and experiences of smaller communities are less represented.
Some say those with access to a high‑speed Internet connection will be able to use AI consistently, but many students do not have that access. So allowing the use of AI for schoolwork could also lead to an unfair situation that will benefit some students over others.

Darayya’s Library
John Edwards, July 21 2016
In Darayya, a city in Syria, there’s a library, and it has 15,000 books on almost every subject. However, it is different from any libraries you know. It is a secret underground library, and only people in Darayya know where it is.
Over the years, war has shaken Darayya badly. Every day, houses are bombed and people are killed.
Stores are closed one after another, and schools are, too. To help the kids in Darayya with their learning, Anas Ahmad, a 19-year‑year-old student, and his friends decided to build a library. They built the library under the ground to keep it safe from bombing. But it is dangerous to collect books for the library. Often, Ahmad and his friends look for books in houses that were bombed. They need to be careful because they may be killed in another bombing.
You may ask, “In a place like Darayya, would people be interested in books?” “Just like the body needs food, the mind needs books,” says one library user. In the library, people enjoy their time of reading and forget about the terrible world above. Through reading, they are able to dream of a better life after war.

Big cats are beautiful wild animals. Let’s find out something interesting about them. The cheetah has long legs and a long tail. It is called the fastest land animal.
Long legs and tails help cheetahs run quickly. The tiger is the biggest of all the big cats. It is much bigger than the cheetah. Leopards are the smallest of the big cats. They are good at climbing. The leopard may look small, but it has lots of power. Jaguars come from America. They have cool spots and have the strongest bite of all the big cats. They are known to eat more than 85 species of prey, including deer, squirrels, birds, and even snails. A lion lives with its family and has no fear of other animals. Female lions give birth to baby lions. What’s more, mother lions do most of the hunting. They hunt for as a group and bring food back for the pride, their family. As for male lions, they sleep a lot to save energy and keep cool. Male lions protect the pride. Therefore, people say that a lion is the king of the jungle. These facts about the big cats are amazing, aren’t they?

Cinco de Mayo
Cinco de Mayo means “May 5th” and is a celebration of Mexican culture. People celebrate it every year in Mexico and some parts of America.
The people of Mexico celebrate Cinco de Mayo with food, music, and dancing. Girls wear beautiful and colorful dresses. They also put flowers in their hair. Boys wear a sombrero, or Mexican hat.
In America, many schools teach children about Mexican culture. Children decorate Mexican flags and learn some Mexican songs and dances. They dance together, have fun, and learn about Mexico. Learning about other cultures is a fun experience for all.

We’ve all been there: you start scrolling on TikTok during a quick study break, and suddenly, an hour vanishes.
Welcome to the “TikTok Brain” phenomenon. Although it’s not an official medical term, this expression is used to explain how TikTok captures our attention and influences behavior, particularly among young people. Research suggests that excessive TikTok use can disrupt your ability to concentrate on tasks requiring extended attention. This is particularly harmful for children and teens, whose brains are still developing the ability to sustain prolonged focus.
Aside from TikTok, platforms like YouTube and Instagram are also adopting the addictive features of short video applications to attract young viewers. To address this issue, some social media companies are initiating measures to help younger users manage their time more effectively. TikTok, for example, sends reminders to users to take a break, stretch or go for a walk. While social media can be entertaining, don’t let it dominate your brain. Stay aware, establish boundaries, and you can strike a balance between digital enjoyment and real‑world responsibilities.
*scroll (v) *vanish (v) *capture (v) *excessive (a) *disrupt (v) *extended (a) *sustain (v) *prolonged *platform (n) *initiate (v) *preference (n)

chunk_text:
Artificial Intelligence (AI) can sometimes seem overpower, but there's no need to be afraid of it. In fact, AI can improve our lives in many ways. Many people may worry that AI will take over their jobs or make them obsolete. However, AI is actually more of a tool that can assist us with lots of things.
One of the biggest things of AI is its ability to analyze large amounts of data and make predictions based on that data. This can be useful in fields such as healthcare, finance, and transportation. For example, AI can help doctors make more correct diagnoses by analyzing medical records and symptoms.
AI can also help us in our day-to-day lives. Virtual assistants like Siri, Alexa, and Google Assistant use AI to understand and respond to our orders. This makes things such as setting reminders, playing music, and searching for information much easier.
Of course, there are also concerns about the wrong use of AI. Deepfake videos, for example, use AI to make videos in a way that makes them look real-life, but they can also be used to spread wrong information or create fake news. It is important for us to be careful and this could be dangerous.
Therefore, AI is not something to be afraid of. It is a powerful tool that can simplify our lives and help us solve difficult problems. However, we must also be responsible users and be aware of the risks. With the right precautions, AI has the potential to make our world a better place.

If you visit Spain, you will hear people speaking Spanish most of the time. But if you go north to the Basque Country, you will also hear a language that is only spoken there: Euskara. Nobody knows when people began to speak Euskara, but one thing is for sure: It was already in Europe before any other language arrived. Having a sense of humor is something most people think of as being uniquely human. It is so important to us that we can already understand it when we’re just babies. Humor makes us laugh, and laughing helps build relationships and brings people together. Although Euskara has been around for thousands of years, it experienced its worst time in the 1990s, when it almost died out. A sense of humor can bring joy, help us be smarter, healthier, and deal with difficult problems. It can also help us think outside the box. It can teach us not to take things so seriously. It can also teach everyone not to laugh at ourselves. People who laugh a lot are not sad or sick very often, neither are those who laugh with them. When the mind is healthy, so is the body. Children who have a sense of humor seem happier. Those who can appreciate and share humor are also more sociable and usually have more friends. But most of all, humor can make life really fun. There’s nothing quite like laughing so hard that your stomach hurts or until tears are running down your face. A sense of humor is not something we’re born with, though. It is something that we learn and grows with us. It also changes when we get older, much like we do. Things that we find funny as kids become too childish to make us laugh when we’re grown up. Babies, for example, don’t really understand humor yet. They just laugh when something we do is funny to them. As children get older, they turn to physical humor and doing funny things either to make themselves or others laugh. From 1939 to 1975, when Spain was in Francisco Franco’s hands, and everyone had to use Spanish only. Under this rule, people who were heard speaking other languages would be stopped by the police. And the police were always around, so the Basque people were afraid to speak Euskara in any public places. They felt that even the walls were listening. Over time, the Basque people spoke Euskara less and less, and some families even stopped teaching their children the language. To save Euskara, some people set up language schools to teach Euskara. Because of their hard work, Euskara was not “killed” but lived on long after Franco died. Although Euskara is heard and seen across the Basque Country today, Spanish is still more commonly used in Spain. However, many people who know Euskara still choose to speak Spanish in public places. For this reason, some people have started to worry about the future of Euskara. How long can it live?

School Bullying
Bullying is now a very serious problem in school. More and more students experience bullying in school. Those students may be afraid of going to school. Some of them will not have hope anymore and even kill themselves.
Bullying is when someone makes you feel bad or hurts you again and again.
Many kids think of bullying as hitting or pushing, but it is more than that. Calling people mean names, laughing at people, speaking something bad about people, taking someone’s things without permission, and not letting someone play in a group are also bullying. Now we even have cyberbullying, and it happens online. Bullying can happen at any age, anywhere, and anytime. It can happen for different reasons. Some students bully others just because they want to get more attention. Some of them feel powerful or popular by bullying others.
If someone is mean to you, ignore him or her and show that you don’t care about it at all. When the bullies see that you don’t care about it, they may feel bored and then stop bullying. If you really don’t know how to do it, you can talk to your parents or teachers. They may help you.
If you are a teacher or a parent and students come to tell you that someone bullies them, please make them feel safe and listen to them without judgement. Try to help them as much as you can. We all have a job to stop bullying.

Murphy’s Law
Picture it’s breakfast time. You are going to take a bite of nice, warm piece of toast. Then you drop it and it falls, you pray for it to land on the side without butter on. However it lands butter-side down! This is a perfect example of Murphy’s Law.
Did you notice that it always rains when you least expect it? Or when you stand in line at a checkout, why does the line next to yours always seem to move faster? And why does your teacher call on you when you don’t know the answer to a question? If it is possible for something to wrong, it will go wrong—this is Murphy’s Law.
The lesson behind Murphy’s Law is to be prepared for the worst. So, if you aren’t ready for tomorrow’s test, don’t even think about cheating because you will get caught. Study hard.

Fake Eyes Protect Cows
Imagine that you are a farmer and keep hundreds of cows. However, large predators like lions come and eat your cows. What will you do to solve this problem? Many people would hunt those lions. This is what farmers in the Okavango Delta in Botswana used to do. They shot the lions with guns, but the problem did not go away. For many years, cows died because of lions, and lions died because of people. The number of lions in Africa has dropped from more than 100,000 in the 1900s to lower than 30,000 in 2020.

Luckily, an Australian biologist named Neil Jordan from the University of New South Wales came up with a smart idea to save both cows and lions. It is to paint eyes on cows butts. In his four-year-study, he followed over 2,000 cows at 14 different farms in the Okavango area. There were 683 with eye-painted butts, but 543 with “X” painted on their butts, and 835 unpainted. The study showed that no cows from the butt-painted group were killed by lions. Jordan was not surprised. He knew before this study that lions usually give up their hunt if they think they’ve been spotted. Now, farmers in Botswana may not need to shoot lions ever again. Sometimes the best way to solve a problem is not to “kill” it but to understand it and “live” with it peacefully.

Fake news is something that is not true. It is usually shown as real news on the Internet and used to hurt the reputation of a person or a country. Though fake news has existed for thousands of years, it is still difficult for most modern people to tell whether news is fake or not. For example, when some countries were fighting the pandemic, a lot of fake news said there was not enough rice on the market because farmers in some rice-growing countries could only stay home all day long. Some totalitarian countries sent the fake news with several pictures to worry people who live in free countries and made them not believe in their own countries. Free countries made it clear that it was fake news right away, but it was still not useful because millions of people read it on the Internet. Many countries try to catch those who make fake news, but the best way to fight fake news is to teach people to spot fake news. First, we have to check the writer and the date. Check if the writer is real, and remember old news is not always relevant to what you see now. Second, don’t let your bias make you believe the fake news, which means you need to think twice after reading any stories on the Internet. Third, ask people who have knowledge about what you are not sure of. Taking these actions may not make fake news die, but more people will be able to fight fake news successfully.

No matter if you are shopping at a supermarket or at a clothing store, many of the prices ____ you see usually have something in common. They often end in .99, but isn’t it a little strange now that you think about it? Why aren’t prices just even numbers?
Many stores like to mark their prices to end in .99 for discounts, and customers almost never notice that ____ . Though no one really knows who or how the trick started, it has been around for at least a century. Ending a price in .99 is based on the theory that because we read from left to right, we usually only see the first number of the price. The price ____ starts with a 4 appears to be a better deal than the one that starts with 5. That’s why even though a product for $4.99 may be just one cent cheaper, the trick always helps sell more. ____ , the .99 alone allows people to believe that the item is on sale. Customers have become so used to it and think they are getting a good deal when they buy something with a price ending in .99.
The trick doesn’t only work for cents. In other studies about women’s clothes, a dress ____ price is changed from $34 to $39 is sold more by a third while changing it from $34 to $44 doesn’t have many different results. In these cases, the demand doesn’t go down ____ the prices are up. This proves that the number 9 has a surprising effect on customers. Do you sometimes feel someone is standing too close to you? Or maybe the person you're talking to keeps backing away, and you try to stay close by stepping closer to him or her? If so, it's probably because of different ideas about the personal space between you and the person you're talking to. According to one study, these ideas may have something to do with where you come from.
The study shows that people in different countries have different ideas about personal space. Romanians like to keep the greatest distance between themselves and someone they've just met. They usually keep a distance of 1.3 meters between themselves and others.
However, Argentinians stand the closest to other people, at a distance of only about 76 centimeters.
Another interesting thing was also found. People from hot and cold countries show the greatest differences in distance. This makes some people think that people in warmer places are friendlier. Whether that's true or not, one thing is for sure such differences could lead to misunderstanding. So, it's important to keep the right distance, or the person you're talking to might think you're invading his or her personal space. As a result, he or she might not feel comfortable around you.

Dear Green Connections,
I love Car Free Day, and I’d like to share how I celebrate it with you and your readers.
Car Free Day is a day that I take very seriously because it is very important not only for us people but also for our planet.
First, I must tell you that before I found out some facts about this special day, I drove my car everywhere. Sadly, I even drove to places that were less than five minutes away on foot. I now know that was bad of me. However, all that has changed. On Car Free Day and all the other days of the year, I ride my bike to the places I need to go.
At first, it was very difficult for me to get to places that were far away from my house because I was out of shape and got tired really easily. Then, over time, I got stronger and could travel to spots that were miles away.
Now, there isn’t a day that I don’t take my bike out somewhere nice in nature.
Biking has truly helped me see the world in a whole new way. What’s more, I can’t imagine going back to the life that wasn’t good for me or the environment.
All the best,
Derek

Do you get tired easily? Maybe the way you live has something to do with that. Check the following list of habits to see if they are the reasons for the problem and if you have any of them.

You are on a plane and ready to take your first bite of airplane food, but it doesn’t taste as good as it does on land. So, why do food and drinks on airplanes taste different?
In fact, we tell flavors through our senses of smell and taste. Sadly, those two senses become less strong when we fly 30,000 feet above the Earth. The humidity level in the air is only 12%, and the air pressure is really low. As a result, our noses don’t work so well. When our noses don’t work well, our sense of taste doesn’t, either. That is because 80% of our sense of taste comes from our sense of smell. Therefore, salty and sweet flavors go down by about 30%. Besides, the loud noise from the plane makes the problem even worse. Luckily, we can still taste bitter, sour, and spicy flavors.
Now, you know what changes the taste of food and drinks on airplanes. So, next time you are on a plane and taste something bad, the problem may not be with the cooks.

Irene: Hi, Leon. I’m checking my friends’ Instagram.
Leon: Again? You really spend too much time on it.

Leon: Have you ever heard of “social media depression”?
Irene: No, what is that?
Leon: Some studies say social media has something to do with depression. It’s easy for social media users to compare themselves with their friends. However, whether they are better or worse than their friends, they always feel worse about themselves in the end.
Irene: I agree. Every time I check my friends’ Instagram, I feel sad. It seems that they have better lives than I do.
Leon: Hey! You should read this study. It says, “Instagram, out of other social media, is most likely to make young people feel depressed.”
Irene: Really? Why is that?
Leon: I don’t know, but I do know one thing—Online communication is very different from face-to-face communication. What you see on social media is not always true.

When I was eleven years old, I lived in a small house with my parents. One morning, before going to school, I saw my father crying. In all my life, I never saw him cry. "What's wrong, Dad?" I asked. He didn't answer. At school, I kept thinking about my father's tears. After I went home, I found out that my uncle died. My father was very close to him. That was why he was so sad. At the funeral, I sat next to my father. I wanted to say something to make him feel better, but I didn't know what to say. I saw my father put a letter in the coffin. I asked him about the letter. He told me it was a letter to his brother. My father said that sometimes he wrote letters to his brother when he missed him. "But how can you write a letter to someone who is dead?" I asked. "You can," he said. "It makes me feel good." A few days later, my father gave me a notebook. "When you miss me, write me a letter," he said. "Even if I'm sitting right next to you, you can still write me a letter." I started writing letters to my father every day. Sometimes I wrote about what happened at school. Other times I wrote about my dreams for the future. Whenever I had a problem, I wrote about it in my letter. Even though my father never wrote back, I still kept writing.

The Horse That Fell into a Well
One day, a farmer's old horse fell into a well. The horse was lucky because there was no water in the well. However, the well was too deep for the horse to get out of. The farmer felt bad for the horse, but he didn't know how to save it. He then decided to bury it in the well because neither the old horse nor the dry well was useful to him anymore.
The farmer had his friends come to help him throw dirt into the well. The horse started to cry when it saw what was happening. But suddenly, an idea came to its mind. Every time the dirt hit its back, the horse would shake it off and walk on it. Finally, enough dirt was thrown into the well, and the horse was able to jump out. The horse didn't give up when it was being buried. Instead, the horse found a way to save itself. The lesson of the story is simple: when life gives you lemons, make lemonade.

Thor Pedersen is a Danish traveler. He recently finished a trip around the world. However, this wasn’t just any trip. He spent nearly ten years visiting every country in the world - and he did it all without flying.
As Thor began to plan his trip, he made a few rules; no flying, no visiting home, and spend at least 24 hours in every country. He hoped that he could live on about $20 a day, and finish his trip in about 4 years. Actually, it took him far longer.
The first part of his trip was pretty easy. He traveled across Europe and North America. But as he moved on to other parts of the world, things began to get much harder. To cross large bodies of water, Mr. Pedersen took boats. Besides, he traveled by taxi, bus, train, and even walking. Sometimes he paid for a place to stay; sometimes people invited him into their homes. At other times, he had to sleep outside. Mr. Pedersen says he had many difficult experiences. He was once held at gunpoint and thought he might be killed. On the other hand, he also had many good experiences. Thor says why he didn’t give up was the help from people all over the world.
Mr. Pedersen’s girlfriend visited him several times as he traveled. When she visited him in Kenya, he asked her to marry him. But before they could get married, the coronavirus pandemic began. Therefore, Mr. Pedersen got stuck in Hong Kong for two years. Luckily, after getting married online, his wife was able to join him for part of that time. Finally, Mr. Pedersen arrived back in Denmark after a 33-day boat ride. He was met by about 150 people, including friends and family members.
Mr. Pedersen has covered around 260,000 miles – about 10 times the distance around the Earth. Later, he plans to write a book and share what he learned in his travels around the world.

Brights Zoo in Limestone, Tennessee is celebrating the birth of a very unusual baby giraffe. What makes this giraffe special is that it doesn’t have any spots. The zoo is asking for help from the public to name the animal.
Tall, long-necked giraffes are famous for their spots. A giraffe’s spots are created when the animal is still growing inside its mother. The spots are believed to help the animals hide from their enemies. The skin below the spots may also help giraffes stay at the right temperature. Just like no two persons have the same fingerprints, each giraffe has its own special spots.
On July 31, 2023, a baby giraffe was born at Brights Zoo with no spots at all. Instead, its hair is a light brown. It was born perfectly healthy. It just doesn’t have any spots. The young giraffe is believed to be the only spotless giraffe in the world. Mr. Bright, the zoo keeper, says that the new giraffe might not have been alive if it had been born in the wild. Brights Zoo is hoping to use the young spotless giraffe to bring attention to protect giraffes. Mr. Bright says the zoo hopes to raise money for groups like Save Giraffes Now and the Giraffe Conservation Foundation.
So far, the young giraffe has not been given a name. Mr. Bright says that his family has thought up thousands of names, and has come up with four possible choices. All of the names are in Swahili, a language spoken in parts of Africa. The zoo will present the winning name later.

A book company in the United Kingdom (UK) has been criticized for changing the words in some of Roald Dahl’s famous children’s books. The publisher said it wanted to make sure the books could “be enjoyed by all.” But many people were mad by these changes.
Roald Dahl was a popular British writer. He wrote many books for children. Several of his books have been made into movies. Mr. Dahl’s stories are often meant to be funny. The books have unusual characters, and subjects are common. Many of Mr. Dahl’s stories are about children, and the children are smarter than grownups. Some grownups in his books are hateful, and they treat children badly. His stories have been enjoyed by millions of young readers. But some people believe that some of Mr. Dahl’s books could also be insulting – especially how he shows some characters.
The book company, Puffin, changed Mr. Dahl’s books, so these books wouldn’t cover anything insulting. The English newspaper, the Daily Telegraph, reported that Puffin had created new of many of Mr. Dahl’s books with “hundreds of changes.”
For example, the word “fat” was taken out of the books. So were the words “ugly” and “crazy.” Instead of “boys and girls,” the new books use the word “children.” Instead of “mothers” or “fathers,” the new books talk about “parents” or “family.” Though Puffin made the changes to avoid insults, the changes in the new books have made many people angry. They say the changes limit the freedom of writers to tell stories in their own ways.
In response, Puffin has said that it will now also publish the old books as “The Roald Dahl Classic Collection.” The readers will be able to choose which version of the stories they want to buy.

Are there any jobs for people in the future?
Our jobs now may never show up in the future. Robots will take over our life. What can robots do? In the car factory, lots of robots make cars day and night. They don’t need to take a rest and seldom make something wrong. In the bank, robots can answer people’s questions and help them.
In the military, robots can do dangerous jobs, like driving and bomb cleanup. They can also fly planes and take action. It can protect people from danger. People may feel safe when being with the robots. As for research robots, they can teach students, write and do research. In the hospital, robots can help doctors and nurses to take care of sick people.
It looks like these robots will take the place of our jobs in the future. However, unlike robots, we people can feel and think.
Take teachers and writers for example: teachers teach students to think and don’t just teach schoolbooks; writers are good at telling stories and share interesting stories with readers.
We people have no idea about the future, but we need to look on the bright side of the future. Just keep learning and thinking, and robots will not take our jobs and even we can work together with robots.

Bai Ju-yi is a famous poet. He passed away over 1,100 years ago, but people are still reading his works today. Children in Taiwan read his poems in Chinese classes, and there are even a lot of foreigners reading and studying them around the world. Bai Ju-yi was a very productive poet. There are about 3,000 of Bai Ju-yi’s poems now.

Bai Ju-yi liked talking about social problems. He also wrote about a lot of interesting things in his own life. In fact, he was working on poems almost all the time. For example, when he missed his family and friends, he wrote poems to them. When he ate something delicious, he wrote poems. He even wrote poems after he had a cup of tea in the afternoon. He had at least 65 poems about tea! Can you believe that?

Thanks to Bai Ju-yi, we can learn a lot about the life of the Tang people. There was no Facebook in the past, but if there were, we would probably see Bai Ju-yi sharing everything in his life on Facebook!

Making new friends may be easy for some people, but for others, it can be the worst part of being in a new place. Luckily, there are a few easy tricks that can help you make friends. Green Tea
Green tea has so many health benefits, and some people think of it as a form of medicine. Perhaps that is why Chinese have been using it for more than 4,000 years to treat all kinds of body problems. Today, scientists know that in green tea there are several substances good to health.
First of all, catechin is helpful for cutting down on cancer. It protects the body from cancer‑causing substances and slows the growth of cholesterol levels and prevents serious health questions such as heart attacks and heart disease.
Second, caffeine makes the heart beat faster and the body more active. It was one thought that caffeine was not truly healthy, but studies say that there are some benefits to drinking caffeine. Among these studies, scientists have happily found that caffeine has something to do with a lower chance of getting Parkinson’s disease and liver disease. Yet, caffeine also has some side effects. It can make people too excited or angry easily, so doctors ask teenagers not to have more than one small cup of coffee a day.
Next, vitamin C is important to humans, but the human body itself cannot make enough number. So we have to get it through food and drink. The vitamin has a hand in building up protection from colds and the flu. Besides, it helps get well from those diseases sooner.
Last, theanine is another good substance found in tea. Scientists have shown that it can lower stress, both mind and body, and make thinking stronger. We can also use it for preventing Alzheimer’s disease.
As you can see, green tea has many great values. Drinking it may help you stay healthy. Of course, as with any healthy substance, it is important to check if there are any side effects as well.

In the big animal world, some animals live together in a special way. That is commensalism.
Commensalism is that one animal gets something good, and the other animal is not benefited or harmed.
For example, sharks are big and strong. Remoras are small fish and they like to swim with sharks.
Remoras can eat leftovers from the sharks’ food. Sharks aren’t good or bad, but they help remoras to be full and happy.
Also, the group of trees and birds is another example. The birds make their sweet homes in trees, but there isn’t anything good or bad for the trees. They just stand there, providing the birds a nice place to live.
In the animal world, some animals live together in this special way. That’s cool, isn’t it?

There were twin brothers named Eric and Ian. They looked the same, but they had different personalities. Eric always thought of the worst, but Ian always hoped for the best. Different meanings. One day, their parents decided to test them. They filled Eric’s room with toys, while they filled Ian’s room with horse manure.

When they went to check on the boys, they found Eric sitting in the middle of his room, and crying. “What’s wrong?” they asked. “All these toys are great, but I know they’ll break or get old someday. Then I’ll have nothing.”

When they went to Ian’s room, they found him digging the manure with a shovel excitedly. “What are you doing?” they asked. “With all the manure,” Ian replied, “there must be a pony somewhere in my room!”

For example, in American and European cultures, a thumbs‑up sign is a symbol of “well‑done.” In Brazil, they don’t use an “OK” gesture because they think it is not polite. So how do Brazilians say agree with a hand gesture? They will give you a thumbs‑up sign. However, in Egypt, a thumbs‑up sign has the same meaning as the Taiwanese middle finger standing alone, so it would be very rude if you do so.

In Germany, counting one starts with the thumb. So, if you need to order one cup of coffee in a German coffee shop, you need to show a thumb, not a pointer finger.

Next time, before you take a trip, remember the words, “When in Rome, do as the Romans do.” Try to know more about each country’s special gestures, or using wrong gestures in wrong places will lead to lots of trouble.

chunk_text:
What is Time
Time is an idea that affects our lives every day. We use it to measure the hours, days, months,
and years. But what is time?
Time allows us to plan a schedule, the future, and our lives. Without time, it would be hard to
plan our day.
The smallest unit of time is the second. Sixty seconds make a minute, sixty minutes make an
hour, and twenty-four hours make a day. A week has seven days, a month can have 28 to 31 days,
and a year has 365 days or 366 days. We can measure time with clocks and calendars. These help us
to know the time and follow our schedules.
Time is also important for our bodies. Our body has a clock that says when to sleep and wake
up. Listening to our body clock helps us stay happy and healthy.

Gender equality is the basic human right and everyone should receive the same treatment no matter their gender. However, it has taken years for women to get the rights that they have now. Very few women studied in college 50 years ago, and most women didn’t have the right to vote until the middle of 20th century. Today, there are still many things that need to be worked on, such as parental leave, the pay gap, and so on.
Iceland is the model country for gender equality. At school, boys are not laughed at when they play with Barbie dolls or collect toys like Hello Kitty. Also, girls are encouraged to be strong and brave and become anything they want to be, even truck drivers and mechanics. Here people won’t doubt each other’s abilities because of gender. In 1980, Iceland also democratically elected the world’s first female president, Vigdís Finnbogadóttir. Today, 65% of its college students and 41% of its ministers are female. What’s more, each pair of parents receives nine month’s paid leave to take care of their baby.
However, being as equal as it is, Iceland has a long way to go, for women still earn around 14% less than men. The government hopes to close the gender pay gap by 2022, and women’s group keep putting pressure on companies. After all, it’s not fair that women get less money just because they are female.

English words are made of 26 letters, and palindromes and anagrams are two kinds of word games about spelling. A word or a sentence reads the same from left to right or from right to left is called “palindrome”, e.g., “eye,” “Bob,” “my gym,” and “Was it a car or a cat I saw?” An anagram of a word or words is made by putting the letters of the word or words in a different way. Look at the words and their anagrams below. Can you think of other possible anagrams of these words?

earth – heart
between – been wet
I eat – a tie
mist – ake

Anagrams are often longer words. They don’t really mean anything but are fun to say. Sometimes they can even mean something special, like when a common word, “restaurant,” becomes “Eat rats, run!”

In fact, palindromes and anagrams are more than just games. Palindromes can be used to learn mathematics and make music. Anagrams are also a good way to hide something. In history, people often hid their important studies in anagrams. Can you think of any other way to use them?

(II)
It’s very common that people stereotype jobs by gender. For example, many people think that driving a truck is a man’s
job and taking care of children is a woman’s. However, stereotyping jobs can make it difficult for the right person
to get the right job.
Many studies show that gender stereotypes often affect a boss’s decision when a company is looking for the right person
for a job. If the boss thinks men are better for the job, it would become a lot more difficult for women to get it. On the
other hand, men can experience this, too. Many feel men are not good teachers for young children because they are not as
patient as women.
Stereotyping jobs by gender isn’t fair, is it? Everyone has their own talent, and it has nothing to do with their gender.
Gender doesn’t make people good at a job, but their ability does.

(D) The job is dangerous, but both men and women can do it well.
